name: XXLify
description: Long levels get more Xs in length

issues.info: Report issues to the Github Repo!

maximum-xs.name: Maximum Xs
maximum-xs.description: How many Xs you can have before an L

xxl-scaling.name: XXL Scaling
xxl-scaling.description: How long levels need to be to get a longer label. The length of the level needs to be multiplied by this number to get a longer Label. (e.g. at 1.5, XL is 2 minutes, XXl is 3 minutes, XXXL is 4,5 minutes etc.)

use-power-notation.name: Use power notation
use-power-notation.description: If enabled, levels above the maximum X limit will be displayed using power notation, i.e. "XXXL" becomes "X^3L"

xxl-plus.name: Enable XXL+
xxl-plus.description: If enabled, levels that are beyond halfway to the next XXL label get a + added to the length

long-plus.name: Enable Long+
long-plus.description: If enabled, levels that are longer than 1m30s will be Long+

label-color.name: Label Color
label-color.description: Color that the XXL label will have

maximum-color.name: Maximum color length
maximum-color.description: Length in minutes at which the color has been reached
